name: 4chan beauty design
description:
allows you to change the background to any sweeeeeeeet image you choose; transparent the post boxes; removes ALL unnecessary bullshit; nav header follows you and you can perma highlight the links you like most; reply box follows you and disappears when not moused over. and moar cant remember right now...

BEFORE : http://i54.tinypic.com/103afqs.png
AFTER : http://i51.tinypic.com/99gguv.png
CLOSE-UP : http://i51.tinypic.com/2qm3xb4.png

****IMPORTANT****
to change the background and install your own background pictures, look for ////// background-image: url("") !important; ////////  obviously you will post the desired link between the ""

example  :  background-image: url("file:///C:/Users/Uncle%20Will/Documents/temp%20b-background.png") !important; that selects a picture from my computer.

if you still can't find it, see this pic : http://i56.tinypic.com/2u75aw6.png

I'll update later for people that want to tweak there own version (with a more friendly how to)

btw this is free, please enjoy. If anyone here is interested in a cool game try AQworlds: my referal link: "http://www.aqworlds.com/aw-newuser.asp?refid=17360534" srsly its a fun game, it's free, no downloading, you should try it out.
